review.reviewBody: Door Dash was having issues, and Little Caesars went above and beyond to send me a extra pizza and wings free of charge due to the delay.
The stuffed crazy is bread is my favourite item in the menu! Our was super hot and cheesy!

Excellent service adjusting my order at store level due to restrictions on the app 👍
thank you
app says store not exceprinh special requests so I can never ger my pizza well done.. always undercooked doughy ..fed uo ordering from there
